title: For the transfer of Rehabilitation tenements allotted to Occupants belonging to the authorised build
clause_text: For the transfer of Rehabilitation tenements allotted to Occupants belonging to the authorised buildings, no premium shall be charged;
section: Process of Allotment to Beneficiaries and Conditions thereof :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
